lexUnit.name: novice.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person new to and inexperienced in a job or situation

sentence.text: I have only recently completed my open water diver training , so I am still a novice at the sport .
does n't sound like a picnic , much less a holiday , but the leaflet helps to prime novices at white water rafting .
So , we were hardly novices at the print and publishing game , both conventionally and electronically .
All novices at this form of stock car racing , they managed to provide the competition 's winner in Dave Brittan , a drilling engineer , who beat 15 other contestants .
Mandeville glared down the table at Rachel who sat , hands joined , like some novice at prayer .
This is a very good program but , if you are not a novice to spreadsheets or computers , you will find it frustrating as it will be too slow for you .
However , Barbara would be the first one to admit she is a novice at choosing ready-to-wear .
When he turned later to real opera , trag)e en musique ( see pp. 373 ff. ) , he was by no means a novice in dealing with French declamation .
In 5 days novices learn enough to skipper a yacht safely on an Ionian flotilla .
Hillier , 22 , played a veteran 's role in the Gunners ' victory against Oldham , guiding novice midfielders Steve Morrow , 22 , and Ray Parlour , 19 , through their big-match Highbury ordeal .
And the organisers are also inviting novice and first-time triathletes to compete for one of a dozen spot prizes .
Meanwhile , leading novice chasers Sybillin and Wonder Man are poised for a pre-Cheltenham clash at Nottingham on Saturday .
THE Irish challenge at this week 's Cheltenham Festival weakened yesterday , when Champion Hurdle contender Novello Allegro and leading novice chaser Soft Day were both ruled out .
It was won by Mr Richard Phelan , a white political novice with a lot of money and appeal in the rich white suburbs ; he beat Mr Eugene Pincham , a black judge .
But they wiped away the national disgrace of Wednesday 's defeat to America 's soccer novices by outfighting one of the favourites to win next year 's World Cup here in the States .
Reagan , furthermore , notwithstanding executive experience as a two-term governor of California , was totally without national political experience and was a complete novice in foreign affairs .
Priced £18.95 , the book is aimed to be as useful to a PC novice as it would be to a seasoned user .
